entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a character in the story. He lets out a bull-like roar and sprints off in the direction of a tall man.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is a location mentioned in the story. Percy roars 'ROOKWOOD!' as he sprints off towards it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story. He thinks that Hermione and Ron are embracing, but then realizes she's trying to restrain him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story. She tries to restrain Ron from running after Percy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a character in the story. He's shaking with rage and grief, and wants to fight Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who have killed Fred. Ron and Harry want to punish them.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a character in the story. He was killed by Death Eaters.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake is an object mentioned in the story. Hermione and Harry need to kill it.

relationships.description: Ron wants to punish Death Eaters for killing Fred.
Harry needs to kill the snake with Hermione's help.
Hermione is trying to restrain Ron from running after Percy.
Harry also wants to punish Death Eaters for killing Fred.
